item.title: Experiment Nebula Mesh - Part 2
item.description: In my previous post, I used Nebula to setup a secured network between 2 virtual machines. This time, I’ll try to make a MySQL client and server communicate throught a Nebula tunel.

item.title: Experiment Nebula Mesh - Part 1
item.description: Is it possible to use the public network, namely Internet, to make 2 machines communicate securely ? And if possible something easier to install and configure than OpenVpn ?
